title: SANLUCE 18 LED Solar Patio Umbrella Outdoor 7.5ft Market Table Steel Umbrella with Tilt and Crank, Waterproof Sunshade Canopy, 6 Ribs Outdoor Umbrella for Garden Deck Backyard Pool, Lake Blue
features: 18 Led Lights with Solar Panel: This sun umbrella, 18 LED lights with 6 ribs help to light up a relaxing night with its pre-installed solar-powered LEDs. No need for a power supply or power cord, solar panel can be used for 8 hours

Heavy Duty Construction: To withstand heavy wind or make it more durable in hot weather, we use steel umbrella bones and 6 iron sturdy ribs, the anti-oxidation spray painted gives it a long period of life

Easy to Use: Smooth crank lift handle located on the support pole opens/closes the umbrella. It is easy to set-up and take-down within seconds. Stay cool at all times, as the easy push-button tilt system gives coverage no matter what time of day

Durable Polyester Fabric: The outdoor umbrella fabric, 180g, to be impermeable to fade-resistant, water, and ultraviolet rays. Stay cool and comfortable outdoors with a beautiful patio umbrella, perfect for sunshade coverage
Wide Coverage: With a 7.5ft diameter providing an extra-wide space for your family and friends to relax and enjoy the summertime, our patio umbrella will be the envy of your neighbors
description: Our beautiful patio umbrella enables you to enjoy an outdoor relaxing time in the hot summer with great shade. Made of solid and durable steel parts, this outdoor umbrella can adapt to the harsh outdoor climate.

The canopy which is made of durable polyester fabrics is waterproof and UV resistant. 18 LED Lights and a central hub light powered by solar rechargeable batteries provide ambient mood lighting. It's perfect for gardens, balconies, decks, swimming pools, or cafes.
Lights: 16 LED Lights, 3 on each of the 6 ribs
Protective Qualities: Fade-resistant, Rust-resistant, UV-resistant, Weather-resistant.
Close the parasol during nights and windy days.
When using the tilting mechanism to change the direction, fully press the push-button.
